description.raw:
This patch will save the current user camera angle when saving a world file and fixes issue #265. This requires parsing the world file generated by the server and inserting the user camera data into a gui element. There's also a minor style fix in the physics test.

I have not included a test because I'm not aware of a way to test gzclient. My test procedure would be the following:

1. Load a world
2. Change the user camera pose
3. Save world as a different file name
4. Verify that saved file has different and correct user camera pose

  4. Verify that saved file has different and correct user camera pose
